properties.Title: CDB, CCB, ICBC, BoC, and BoComm provide $2 billion syndicated buyer’s credit loan for 1980MW Vinh Tan 3 Coal-Fired Power Plant Construction Project
properties.Funding Agencies: Bank of China (BOC)|China Bank of Communications (BoCom or BoComm)|China Construction Bank Corporation (CCB)|China Development Bank (CDB)|Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC)
properties.Receiving Agencies: Vinh Tan 3 Energy Joint Stock Company (VTEC)
properties.Implementing Agencies: Harbin Electric International Co., Ltd. (HEI)|Vinh Tan 3 Energy Joint Stock Company (VTEC)
